blogPost.excerpt: Increment.me is an easy way to get anonymous feedback about anything.

blogPost.title: Increment - Easily get anonymous feedback on anything.
blogPost.author: thomaswilley

localize.description: Increment.me是一个获取匿名反馈的简单方法。
localize.tagline: 轻松获得任何事情的匿名反馈。

localize.description: Increment.me是一個獲取匿名反饋的簡單方法。

previous.excerpt: With LeafPile you can collect and organize your inspiration, thoughts, images, videos, and links in once place. It is simple, easy to use and best of all free!
previous.title: LeafPile - Visual bookmarking made easy.

localize.description: 有了LeafPile，你可以收集和组织你的灵感，思想，图片，视频和链接在一个地方。它简单，易于使用，最重要的是免费。
localize.tagline: 可视化的书签，让你轻松实现。

localize.description: 有了LeafPile，你可以收集和組織你的靈感，思想，圖片，視頻和鏈接在一個地方。它簡單，易於使用，最重要的是免費。
localize.tagline: 可視化的書籤，讓你輕鬆實現。

next.excerpt: Duet makes it really easy to record and remix music asynchronously with your friends and the world. This is in limited beta, feedback welcome!
next.title: Duet - Record music asynchronously really easily

localize.description: Duet让你真正轻松地与朋友和世界异步录制和混音音乐。这是在有限的测试，欢迎反馈
localize.tagline: 异步录制音乐真的很容易

localize.description: Duet讓你真正輕鬆地與朋友和世界異步錄製和混音音樂。這是在有限的測試，歡迎反饋
